hero_subtitle: Complex app integrations, tedious manual tasks. Solve them simply with 'When... Then...' rules.
about_quote: The most dangerous kind of waste is the waste we don't recognize.
philosophy_lead: We believe in the power of 'connection'. Taske's goal is to help you focus on more important things by weaving separate services into one.
space_desc: Set rules run accurately in the background
intentional_desc: Apply it wherever you need, from work to personal life
process_discover_desc: Choose the condition for the task to start
process_reduce_desc: Set the task to execute when the trigger occurs
brand_identity_desc: Get a Slack notification with today's weather every morning at 9 AM. Send an email reminder 10 minutes before a Google Calendar event starts.
web_design_desc: When an email with a specific keyword is received, automatically save attachments to Google Drive. Get a Discord notification when a subscribed YouTube channel uploads a new video.
art_direction_desc: Every Monday, send an email summary of specific data from Google Sheets. When a new post appears in an RSS feed, add it to a Notion database.
